website_summaries.verdict: A quality 2-in-1 product that's gentle on fur and your wallet.
pros: Sits at a low price point
Formula is free of soap, artificial dyes, and parabens
Lathers well and will not wash out topical treatments

customer_reviews.title: She always smells like Fritos and dirt
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a bunch of different things to try to destink my lab/pit. She always smells like Fritos and dirt. This stuff worked a bit longer than anything else I've tried and the shampoo itself smells pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I have a golden retriever. As many probably know, they are one of the stinkier breeds. We bathe him with this shampoo and he smells fresh for days. No shampoo can stop the odor for too long since he jumps in the pool on a regular basis, but this seems to work better than others. Plus, he has had no skin irritation from using it and he is bathed every 1 to 2 weeks due to his daily adventures in the dirt, mud, and water.
customer_reviews.author: Smithereens

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a Clean Animal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Bagel, she's a Beagle mixed with something or other. Even though she's > 10 years old she's still extremely active, and when the Georgia summer hit she started coming inside covered from head to toe in clay. This soap did a perfect job tidying her up, removing any trace of dirt (especially in her white accents) and leaving her coat soft and smelling fresh..... until she manages to mess it up again!
customer_reviews.author: Elliott W

customer_reviews.title: TAKE A CHANCE, IT'S WORTH IT! YOU WILL BE HAPPY WITH THE OUT COME! "TRUST ME"
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE everything about this shampoo! I purchased it as a pop up deal. It was really inexpensive. I was very leary about it. I am so glad that I took a chance because it is the best Shampoo I have used on my PURE WHITE MALTESE. This shampoo makes his coat so Vibrate, Soft and Silky. It smells great too! I am so glad that I took a chance and purchased it. The product does not dry out his skin. He has very sensitive skin and this shampoo, is THE BEST!!! It is the "BEST" DOG SHAMPOO that I have used in 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: By DON'T SETTLE FOR LESS $$$

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: It smells awful. Cheap! It sure does not have a fresh Scent. It smells old. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Karla McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Soft fur and less smell
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best! Our dog gets smelly fast. We've been told that's because of her breed. We've tried a lot of different products but she gets smelly again real quick. This stuff is going on 2 weeks and she still doesn't smell as bad. On top of that, sometimes after bathing her she'll get mats in her fur unless we spend a lot of time brushing her out. This time, using this stuff, her fur is still soft and we haven't had any of the matting issues we normally do. To top it off this stuff has a great price. I'm definitely putting this on the regular buy list.
customer_reviews.author: Nugg

customer_reviews.title: Big improvement
customer_reviews.text: Big improvement over the older natures miracle oatmeal shampoo I was using for my dog previously. Even if I worked that one into his skin through his first, he still smells a little bit doggy at the end of the bath. This completely has next to any odor. He just smells sweet and fresh. Seems to have been kind to his skin, as it did not dry him out and leave him itching. A friend gave me a tip to mix some of this in with water in a hair color bottle, then shoot it into his fur. Seems to penetrate the fur better down to the skin to help really clean him and remove any odor.
customer_reviews.author: M. EvansTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It made good lather but cleaned poorly and had zero
customer_reviews.text: It made good lather but cleaned poorly and had zero, I mean zero conditioning properties. Dog's hair came out dry and hard. Not soft or silky as it is supposed to be. I do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MCOM Corp

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the size, not moisturizing enough for my giant breed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good deal on grooming products because I have a giant breed and felt like I was burning through my earth bath products. I had an Anatolian Shepherd mix previously who really enjoyed rubbing as much dirt as possible into his coat. This seemed to work okay with him. Now, I have a Great Pyrenees. I was skeptical of how moisturizing an all-in-one product can be. Unfortunately, my instinct was right. While I love the fragrance and the price for the quantity is great, I feel like this product strips a lot of moisture. I'm going to have to stick to earth bath even though it's significantly higher in price per ounce.
customer_reviews.author: ltd0713

customer_reviews.title: Caused a horrible rash all over my sensitive's dog's skin
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo quality and smell is nothing great. I think the seller on Amazon is selling a subpar batch at a lower price. I used it twice on my dog and he has had terrible rashes, itchiness, and inflammation all over his skin ever since. I'm throwing away the two bottles I got in high hopes. Now I have to spend more money on soothing his inflamed skin. No thanks to this cheap trash!
customer_reviews.author: PreeVish

customer_reviews.title: Love it - my coonhound smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo so much that I am going to get the perfume and doggy wipes in the same scent. I didn't know how I would feel about the mix of honey and sage, but this stuff smells AMAZING, and my dog smells amazing after I bathe her with it. She is a stinky lady, being a hound dog, but this stuff keeps her smelling good for a few days at least. Most other shampoos only keep the scent down for a couple hours. I wish they made the shed reducer in this scent, it's my favorite, but nothing to really complain about!
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe V.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, nice odor and good for skin and coat of my dog
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shampoo for my dog. She is a swimmer and gets pretty wet and muddy every day. I need to give her a bath every week. Odor is pleasant, very good for her skin and hair. No more flaking and the coat is nice and shiny. It is soap free so it will not harm your dogs skin or coat. Great. One star less because the handling of the giant bottle is a bit difficult, specially if you are in a dog wash, need to hold the dog, the water hose and the bottle with shampoo. It is getting very slippery so it felt off my hands. Otherwise is this product unbeatable for this price.
customer_reviews.author: yeah07

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and makes the cost tangle free
customer_reviews.text: I've only ever owned mixed breeds until my daughter begged me to get her a Chinese Created Powder Puff. Cute dog, but the smell is SO BAD. No infections of any kind. A diet change helped, but didn't solve the problem. Not only did this shampoo make him smell better than a normso canine, but it made his fur - which is super silky and a tangled nightmare, possible to brush. This stuff is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing! Bottle is Difficult to Hold
customer_reviews.text: My senior dog wears diapers so I have to give him a bath daily. It is difficult to remove the urine smell from him fur. This shampoo has the best smell that lasts! The shampoo is great. I love - love - love the smell! The only negative is that the bottle leaked a bit during shipping and the bottle is too large, slippery, heavy and difficult to hold during bath time. It would be better if the bottle was more narrow so it was easier to hold or if the bottle had a texture on it so it was not so slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Megan M

customer_reviews.title: Great scent and effectiveness!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shampoo. I buy bottles in multiples and have now bought a total of 5 bottles. The scent lingers after the bath and is a subtle smell of honey. It isn't the best at lathering, but my dog is very large and I have to use a lot of shampoo anyway. It takes care of any yucky odors my dog has on his hair. I recommend this shampoo to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: HWeathers

customer_reviews.title: only one BUT
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells AMAZING, and it seems to be wonderful for sensitive skin because my Malinios who normally breaks out and itches after a bath, did not. However, its doesnt suds up very well at all. So I recommend mixing some in a separate bottle with some water, to make it last longer, or you'll end up using almost an entire bottle of 3 dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Simply, this. This is the dog shampoo that works.
customer_reviews.text: We adopted a 7-year old good-gurl (years ago), and tried a few shampoos. With a bit of research, we came across this product and Quickly liked it. After using one more competitor, we settled upon Nature’s Miracle and have not regretted it. Our dog is fairly active, and by the end of the week her presence is becoming known in the house. This shampoo eliminates the smell, and our dog’s fur is soft for days. Usually our children wash the dog - when they give her a “double wash,” she ends up free of odor for nearly the entire week. Highly recommend this shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: tomb

customer_reviews.title: The best soap free formula.  No more soapy doggy shampoos for me!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many dog shampoos. All of these Nature's Miracle lines are the best!! This formula doesn't use soap that takes forever to rinse out and dries out my pets skin. Nature's Miracle is a NO SOAP formula and uses enzymes instead. It suds up just the same and the aroma is fantastic, then rinses out at least TWICE as easy as traditional shampoo. It just seems like a cleaner less invasive product vs. soapy shampoo. ... This HONEY SAGE scent is my favorite. My dogs fur feels soft and smells fresh for days.
customer_reviews.author: Tim J.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! A great improvement over my previous shampoo.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this on my super furry Golden Retriever and it is fantastic. Before I have been using just the cheapest generic dog shampoo off the shelf. It would only take a few days before he started smelling a little funky. This shampoo probably goes easily 2 weeks or so without any foul odors and smells pretty good. Plus I notice his coat is a lot more shiny than before. Try it for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite scent
customer_reviews.text: This dog shampoo is OK, it does not really control odor. I'm not crazy about the scent. It wasnt expensive, I will use it up but will try another scent next time. Our golden has allergy issues and it did not seem to make his skin worse, so that is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: GK5040Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for my stinky dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 Pomeranians and every time I bathe them they just smell like musty wet dog. I hate that. When I bathe them with this shampoo they smell just like this shampoo and their fur is so soft. This shampoo really gets smell out of their coat.
customer_reviews.author: Ary Anderson

customer_reviews.title: ♡♡♡ this shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Rhodesian/Shar-Pei mix that is 14 years old. Poor boy is growing keratin inside instead of outside his body. This causes nasty bumps and and super stinky scabs. This shampoo is a scent saver! Seriously... boy smelled so bad, he stunk up the entire upstairs, actually he stunk up everything! Since this shampoo that I used TWO WEEKS AGO he has had NO STENCH AT ALL! it's amazing! I love this shampoo! I used it on my 2 other dogs and have had the same success (only they don't really stink- they're just normal smelling dogs)! It's amazing!
customer_reviews.author: V. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: mild, pleasant scent
customer_reviews.text: This really keeps the odor under control on my little stinker. With the original shampoo the odor would return in about 6 days. This shampoo controls the odor for at least 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: JASON

customer_reviews.title: Product leaked due to cap being loose
customer_reviews.text: Opened box and found that the shampoo leaked due to cap being loose. I had ordered 2 different brands of dog shampoo, and the other brand was fine. Thankfully the bottle was encased in a plastic bag which kept the shampoo from leaking on the box. Not worth returning for a replacement, especially as I need it now.
customer_reviews.author: Bren LeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: We have a golden retriever doggo. Typically, she gets VERY smelly VERY quickly. But this shampoo & conditioner has helped that TREMENDOUSLY. First, she smells great after she is bathed. Then, the odor control REALLY WORKS. I honestly went in without high hopes - yes, other reviews say it works, so I thought why not give it a shot? However, after it working so well, it will definitely be all that we buy for our doggo going forward.
customer_reviews.author: L. Dadabbo

customer_reviews.title: Lots of rinsing. Perfume.
customer_reviews.text: This is just OK. The scent has a bit perfume, and it’s a little strong. The shampoo was just thick enough so it didn’t run while applying it. It worked in easily, but did take a lot of work to rinse it all out. It did leave his coat nice and soft. Although the price on this is nice, I’ve found better shampoos, so I won’t get this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Scintilla

customer_reviews.title: Love the product but the packaging...
customer_reviews.text: I have previously bought this product at Petco and loved it because it really works and lasted for a week and a half on my smelly pitbull. However, I was disappointed with Amazons packaging. The bottle was open and leaked inside the protective bag. The spill wasn't bad but since I'm not the only person this has happened to, I figured I would give you a warning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog odor better
customer_reviews.text: Finally my Terrier mix dog doesn't stink 4 days after his bath! He's even good 3 weeks later. I don't notice any fragrance from the shampoo, no skin reaction (he has white sparse terrier fir) and softness is same as with other vet-recommended shampoo - Hylyt. I do notice it bothers his eyes a little more than his other shampoo, but it passes quickly with no residual.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Did not work at all for us.
customer_reviews.text: It's spilled all over the shipping package. It does nothing for the smell of my golden retriever/huskey mix. I washed him twice thinking I just didn't saturate him good enough the first time but the second proved that wasn't the case. A few people actually think he smells worse. In the bottle it sort of smells like a flowery, wet dog scent. Perhaps I just got a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Agnes

customer_reviews.title: Above Average
customer_reviews.text: I have a malamute and a husky I bought this to use on them. It doesn't irritate their skin. It suds up nicely and gets them clean. It has a good odor neutralizing quality but it fades a little quicker than other shampoos that we've used. I can say I would get this again.
customer_reviews.author: Leah’s Loves

customer_reviews.title: Easy to lather, great smell and unbeatable price.
customer_reviews.text: One of the better pet shampoos out there. First the scent is great and last for a couple of days. It’s not overwhelming and it doesn’t smell like NM’s carpet spray because I find that smell sharp and overpowering. Then the shampoos really lathers well and plenty of foam when I scrubbed my dog. This is important because I find that ones that doesn’t have much foam I tend to over use and wasteful. Lastly, the price is unbeatable. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: C. Abe

customer_reviews.title: Best for odor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product about a year ago and when I ran out couldn't fid it again. Searching on Amazon I was thrilled to find it again. I can without hesitation recommend this product for odor control, hair shine and softening. My poor dog suffers from a skin condition which causes her to itch and smell. This product got rid of the smell but her itch is something else. I've tried everything but nothing seems to work except a visit to the vet for a shot for her itching. If anyone out there has any suggestions that worked for your best friend please advise. I've tied almost everything I feel.....
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Works!!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is great. I have used it simce my bichpoo was 3 months old. You don't get a rich lather, but it cleans and rinses well. He doea not itch and his skin is not dry and patchy. The smell is ok, it is not like sniffing a field of wildflowers or anything, but not gross either. I am not in it for the smell, except that it gets rid of the dog smell which this does! I tub him every Friday due to allergies, so he gets to dig and get all muddy on Thursdays. The bottle is massive so product to price ratio is outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: crazy mom

customer_reviews.title: foams up nicely and smells great!
customer_reviews.text: My friend who's a vet recommended this. she uses this for all her dogs. I have pit mix and i just can't stop petting and hugging her after she showers every time because she would be so soft and smell so good! I actually had a subscription for this but ended up cancelling because it was sending my refill too soon. This foams up so well i didn't have to use too much of it.
customer_reviews.author: Anita L.

customer_reviews.title: Great brand at any price!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. This was way cheaper as an add-on than the local pet store price. Dogs smelled and looked great after the first use. The white parts of my basset-pitbull were gleaming. My mom commented that the shampoo smelled good enough for her to use!
customer_reviews.author: Wishful Thinking

customer_reviews.title: Good for wooly Husky, GSD
customer_reviews.text: Gone through a whole bottle of this on our GSD and Husky and it lasted for several baths (tons of fur on those pups). It works well to condition their coats enough to not cause matting or increase brushing difficulty post-bath, unlike other shampoos. I only wish the bottle had a pump because it can be difficult to handle squeezing it out between a wiggly dog and a wiggly detached shower head.
customer_reviews.author: ATN

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because my dog has a strong smell and was looking for a shampoo to help. It did help for a few days but did not last as long as I wold have liked. It did help with the itching as I have not noticed my pup scratching as much. It is a good productd, I just wish it helped more with the small for a longer period.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shampoo I’ve found for my stinky hound!!! I bring this to wherever he is getting groomed and make them use it. It keeps odor down for way longer than anything else they have used on him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best dog shampoo ever
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best dog shampoo I have ever used!! I have a yellow lab and each time I would be there she would have a very strong musty smell no matter what type of shampoo are you. But this shampoo, the smell is gone!! Even a week later she smells amazing!! I recommend this shampooed anyone who has a dog with a very strong musty smell after bathing!! Great price for the amount they send you!! I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: MintyMoo

customer_reviews.title: No more stinky dog
customer_reviews.text: Our 11 yr old golden has gotten extra smelly in her old age. Our usual shampoo wasn't getting rid of the musty dog smell but this stuff did the trick. The smell left behind isnt overly perfumey and definitely got rid of the dog smell. I also really liked how easily the soap rinsed out so I wasn't using as much water. This shampoo also leaves fur super soft and fluffy.
customer_reviews.author: CarolynTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Now with more water!
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty well with my dog. No reactions and does a good job with his odor. I wash, rinse and repeat in the shower (baths just trap the smell). When I am rinsing him with the shower wand I use my free hand to rub out the excess. This seems to be a key technique for odor removal. Not happy that the most recent bottle I bought has been noticeably watered down.
customer_reviews.author: anti-Murphite

customer_reviews.title: Best Dog Shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST dog shampoo I have ever tried in my 14 years of owning dogs! My dogs are 75 pounds of stinkyness and Nature's Miracle works so well that I only have to wash them once when they get bathed, rather than 2-3 times with other brands. Their coats are soft and shiney after use, and they even smell good! I will be reordering this shampoo for the rest of their lives!
customer_reviews.author: MCR

customer_reviews.title: really good price for a huge bottle
customer_reviews.text: really good price for a huge bottle, does not smell too bad, but doesn't control the odor on a german shepherd for very long, last a day or two then the shepherd smell comes back again, worked on my jack russel pretty well
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It cleans my pup and leaves him very soft, but the scent is not the most pleasant to me (it’s not bad either). It just doesn’t have a “clean” smell after I bathe my pup, more like smell of a wet towel which encourage me to immediately dry the pup so the smell won’t linger
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Nice All Around Pet Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This gave a pleasant smell and my dogs hair was soft after bathing. He has kinda course hair and this worked without using additional conditioner. Conditioning his hair makes him stink a lot quicker and doesn’t work for him because his hair is on the shorter side. Good price and value.
customer_reviews.author: THRIFTYMOM

customer_reviews.title: YES!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my pup! We wash him once a week so we definitely needed a shampoo that wouldn’t dry out or irritate his skin. I always try to buy the healthiest options I can find and this is by far one of my favorites! It doesn’t irritate his skin at all and he feels so soft afterwards. The smell is also very light and refreshing! Will definitely by buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I do use Natures Miracle dog shampoo on our dog between groomer visits. Walking him daily in sloppy winter weather can make his legs and under carriage quite smelly. Using Natures Miracle is gentle enough to use in-between groomer visits and makes him smell so clean. Besides he loves the attention!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Best dog shampoo ever!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used a lot over the past 6 years we’ve had our dog- I will never use a different shampoo. She would dig at herself so bad she’s bleed and always smelled awful. After one use- she stopped licking and digging. Doesn’t smell again for weeks before she needs another bath.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Corsaro

customer_reviews.title: A bath time must have!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo! My dog goes to daycare several times a week and can get pretty stinky. This shampoo is gentle on his skin but cleans him up well and leaves a nice, clean, shiny coat. It suds up well and rinses easily. The scent is very light and pleasant. I will continue to purchase this over and over again. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great deodorizing shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I'm really glad I tried this out. My two small dogs get really stinky over time when their long fur is growing out. Other shampoos would just linger on top of their stink and they would just smell like a wet dog for awhile after baths. This shampoo makes me want to bury my nose in their fluff! Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tia W.

customer_reviews.title: Deep cleans
customer_reviews.text: My dog hates a bath so I don't do it as often as I should. This last time she really stunk and had some matted fur. This shampoo really had her smelling amazing for a couple of days! I use something in addition for conditioning her.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Worked OK.
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. Not very sudsy (but may not actually be a traditional soap). My dog has very bad skin. And this irritated him. But it may be just fine for "normal" skin. I am not upset. I gave it away to a friend. I do trust this brand though, very much.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Cicon

customer_reviews.title: Black Lab Mix Puppy
customer_reviews.text: Our pup feels incredibly soft after using this. We bathe him often, as he's always at dog parks, and there's still so much of the bottle left. We fully lather him up and it doesn't seem to irritate his skin at all. His coat is shiny and the smell stays for a long time. Smells great! We get compliments from friends and family all the time about how soft he is and how good he smells.
customer_reviews.author: Max Saltzman

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: VERY large bottle, smells really good, lathers up well, rinses clean and definitely works for sensitive skin. My dog smells great and the price was just right on the pocketbook!
customer_reviews.author: Geekfamily2008

customer_reviews.title: Leaking upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: The product is as described. I have yet to use it but it was leaking in the box upon arrival. The top was no screwed on all the way so the plastic bag is all covered with the soap. The smell is good but then I discovered the plastic bag had holes in it so it leaked into the box that it was shipped inside of. I hope the product works on my dog but I’m disappointed by how it was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: C. F.

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice and doesn't dry out the skin or hair!
customer_reviews.text: My pup romps in the lake and swamps on a weekly basis, so he ends up getting a nice bath either week or bi-weekly. I was concerned that his skin would dry out, but I think the oatmeal in this product really helps prevent that. I have a short-haired Plott Hound mix, and he smells so sweet (not like wet dog). His hair is usually pretty soft after a bath too, which is surprising since my hound has wiry hair.
customer_reviews.author: krobb

customer_reviews.title: If only my dog loved baths as much as I love this shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: The shape of the container makes it super easy to keep control of the bottle, even with soapy hands. Used this on my Shar Pei, a breed notorious for sensitive skin, without any issues. If my back could have endured more time over the edge of the tub, I’m sure we could have gotten rid of ALL the “dog odor”; any residual odor is due to a missed area, I’m sure. Pleasant smell, and not overly hard to rinse from the coat.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars! This is the one you want!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to for dog grooming. It smells great, makes their fur feel very soft and is excellent for dry skin (extreme cases- please see vet or try coconut oil). It’s all-natural, and a significantly better price compared to similar natural dog shampoos/conditioners. A must-have for our furry friends!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Dang I liked the smell a lot more than i thought I would
customer_reviews.text: Dog came out clean and he smelled good to me. I am chemically sensitive and the scent did not bother me. Your results may vary as everyone's sensitivity and nose are different. I like this stuff it is a good change from flea and tick shampoo. January 2020 Price doubled, OUCH!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hallock

customer_reviews.title: I love this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I just got a new 2 yr old black lab. This shampoo is so great. She smells great. Although I don't think the shampoo claims it as a de-sheeding shampoo it helps loosen the undercoat hairs and they come right off during and after drying her. It makes her coat super, super soft. I could pet her all day for relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Shell D

customer_reviews.title: Sudsy, smells good, cleans well
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo for my dog! She loves running in the yard for a long time and often comes in wet, dirty, and smelly. We use this to bathe her about every 2 weeks (advised by our vet for her breed) and it always leaves her feeling and smelling great. Her coat has remained healthy and soft as she's gotten older and I'm always impressed with how soft her fur is! We will definitely repurchase and use this throughout her life.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product
customer_reviews.text: The size of the bottle was excellent for the price. I’m glad it was wrapped in a bag because upon arrival the cap was not twisted on all the way and had spilled a bit. The smell is great in the bottle but does not smell on my dog at all. Did do it’s job, clean and odor control and surprisingly left my short hair dachshund super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky P

customer_reviews.title: Soft pup!
customer_reviews.text: The smell is mute and nice. It's not overpowering but it doesn't last long. It doesn't seem to help with odor control at all though. By the time he's dry I can pretty much no longer smell the shampoo and he's a bit dog smelly a few days after. I'd by it again because it's cheap and cleans well but I wouldn't buy it for it's other qualities.
customer_reviews.author: RiTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Soft, shiny, and smelling good!
customer_reviews.text: Love hiw this shampoo smells. We have 2 very different coated dogs-- a cattle dog chihuahua mixand a long haired doxie and border collie mix. They both come out shint, soft, smelling good. I still use a littleextra conditioner for the collie mix as she is prone to mats around the ears, but for the price, this is an awesome value.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!! Great value!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo! I switched to this from a Harts brand, and it is such a difference! My dog's fur is soft, clean, and I love the scent! My only complaint would be that the label is not water resistant, and when it got wet, it started to peel off my bottle. Minor inconvenience, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: 4TheLoveOfHiking

customer_reviews.title: Scent didn't last but coat looks great
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty nice and thick shampoo but I didn't really notice the supreme odor control. I don't kind of hoping she would smell like the shampoo scent but the scent isn't very strong and it goes away as soon as you time it down the drain. However it did get her coat nice and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: VeroJ

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and really neutralizes miss stinky after a romp on the farm. My only problem is that the bottle is huge and its hard to grab with soapy hands while trying to keep the dog in the tub. Its slick and heavy and I dropped it many times. So, I filled an old soap bottle for easy dispensing and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Aly Kate

customer_reviews.title: Nice fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I bathed two dogs! Both responded well to the nice scent, and their coats were soft after. My only complaint was the bottle being so large it was hard to handle so the next time I used It I transferred to a smaller bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Fenwick

customer_reviews.title: No more stinky dog!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! My lab mix was so stinky! Even a couple days after a bath, she was stinky. I bought this based on the reviews and I am now bathing her about every four weeks! I’ve not noticed that gross smell at all. This shampoo seems to have completely taken care of her BO problem.
customer_reviews.author: M. Grimmett

customer_reviews.title: Affordable,  shipped fast, qua.ity product!
customer_reviews.text: Left my dogs smelling great, soft and a pleasure to be around! My small dog is usually itchy after a bath. Natures miracle leaves her skin soft, no red patches on her belly. Also it is quick and easy to rinse off. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Hansen

customer_reviews.title: 2 days- no stink!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t speak to sensitivity because my dog doesn’t have sensitive skin. But she is a golden retriever with long fluffy fur and she stinks like all the time. After using this, her smell is completely neutralized. We’re going on day 2 right now and there’s not even a whiff of dog scent in the house whereas before the bath I couldn’t even have her on my lap she smelled so bad. It lathered you great and the smell was nice and natural- not overwhelming at all. We’ll see how long it lasts before the next bath but even 2 days of no stink is a game changer for us!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: She smells so good.
customer_reviews.text: My old lady Maggie is 15 and doesn't need flea and tick shampoo, but that is all I can find out here (I live in the boondox). She also gets very dry skin when we use the before mentioned stuff. This shampoo makes her smell good and doesn't dry out her skin. It is exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Kicza

customer_reviews.title: Fine dog shampoo
customer_reviews.text: The scent is pleasant and the naturally derived ingredients seem to be effective.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great for all hair types!
customer_reviews.text: Harlie, 5 yrs old red nose pitbull, has very sensitive skin - the oatmeal in this product is so soothing for her! Ronan, 3 yrs old Australian shepard mix, sheds a lot and has thick hair - this product makes him smell great and makes him feel so soft! This is great for all hair types.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Fortin

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing and doesn't irritate dog's sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have a goldendoodle with sensitive, dry skin. After several washes with this she hasn't had any irritation or spikes in dryness. I can already tell a difference in her hair's moisture level. Bonus is that it smells wonderful, practically masks the wet dog smell without being overwhelmingly artificial/perfume-y.
customer_reviews.author: Con1207

customer_reviews.title: Love this shampoo/conditioner
customer_reviews.text: We are LOVING this for our puppy. He is definitely cute on his own (Sheepadoodle breed) but this stuff must really work because people comment on his coat being shiny all the time, even our vet. We're happy we bought two bottles when we did and as soon as we need more, we'll be back! So far the stuff seems to be lasting great :)
customer_reviews.author: Alana Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic purchase at excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: We have two Chessies who are always swimming in disgusting muddy and swampy water. This is the first shampoo this we’ve found that gets the smell off, doesn’t leave a wet dog smell and leaves their coats soft. We are absolutely buying more and will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Globemaster 3

customer_reviews.title: This shampoo does not work for my smelly dog!!
customer_reviews.text: I have an adorable dog who unfortunately has body odor problems. In order to stand her near me, she has to be bathed once a week at a minimum. When I saw this shampoo, I thought I had found the answer. Unfortunately, it doesn't work as well as other "regular" dog shampoos. She starts smelling sooner and worse when using this product. I'm still looking for that shampoo that will enable me to go at least a few days longer between baths for my "baby".
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Justice

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality-price ratio and a good product
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for bathing my dog. Cleansed well & left fur soft. Excellent value (under $3.00 for the bottle, which will last for many shampoos). Giving 4 stars because it did not appear to be tear free for washing dog’s head.
customer_reviews.author: CPP

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Dislike you have to buy two but it really does work well. My Boston rubbed herself in her own poop and this worked so well. She smells much better for much longer than burts oatmeal shampoo and makes her fur very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Love this shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog smells so good for a couple days after a bath now and her coat is very smooth. She's a pit bull and hates bath time but doesn't seem to itch as much with this either. Much better value than many other products on the market so we will keep using this one.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Cause my two golden retrievers to scratch
customer_reviews.text: I want to start off by saying this stuff smells great. It has a nice honey suckle smell that I love, and I was as excited to bath them with this soap, but unfortunately after about 30 mins after the bath. They began to scratch like crazy. So sadly this didn’t work for my pups. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Tanya J Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Which smells worse ...
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo has a distinctive smell that's not particularly pleasant. I'm not sure if the stinky dog isn't better than the shampoo scent. I've washed her with it twice and I'm reluctant to use it any more. I got this because I've had terrific good luck with the Nature's Miracle Skunk Odor Remover - THAT STUFF WORKS - but this shampoo is a bust.
customer_reviews.author: D. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Always pleased with this product. Even gets rid of skunk smell when my dog gets sprayed. It’s also sensitive enough that me dog doesn’t break out like he has with other shampoos. Plus the size of the bottle for the price is an excellent deal! Better than in stores!
customer_reviews.author: iam4peace

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I have a Terrier with long wire hair and Chihuahua . I wish it left my terrier’s hair softer, other wise it is great with his sensitive skin!! And I love the light scent! For my other dog, it works well. Since his hair is so much shorter, there isn’t the same concern. Both dogs are rescues so their breads aren’t exact just what the vet has said.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Does an adequate job
customer_reviews.text: This is inexpensive and comes in a big bottle. I bathe my dog every 2 weeks because I have no grass just dirt and when it rains, well, she gets quite dirty. It works well and leaves her with a silky coat
customer_reviews.author: megawatt.mitch

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing and keeps fur soft
customer_reviews.text: I will reccomend this stuff to everyone I know! Its has helped keep my oily pitbull so fresh and clean!! He still smells great even 2 or 3 weeks after I used it. His fur is also SO SOFT and shiny
customer_reviews.author: Alysha

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders for a stinky doggo
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few different dog shampoos, some okay, some terrible -- this one is GREAT. My dog -- who can get REAL stinky -- will not only not smell, but actually smell GOOD for more than a week/up to two weeks with this stuff. I'm pretty impressed because I didn't think it was possible for her to actually smell good.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: It lathers up good, rinses off well without lingering in their fur
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an expert on dog shampoo, but I have 4 dogs that I use this product on. It lathers up good, rinses off well without lingering in their fur. What I noticed most of all is how nice the dog's fur looks after using. It's shiny and soft, especially noticeable on my black lab.
customer_reviews.author: DAJSATX

customer_reviews.title: great for many breeds
customer_reviews.text: I use this shampoo on a pit bull with sensitive skin and a yorkie with fine hair, it works wonderfully for both! Excellent value too. This is my new go-to shampoo. The scent is nice and keep the pit from getting stinky for about 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Megz

customer_reviews.title: Just used this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I used this product yesterday. No strong odor at all. It worked good and our dogs fur is very soft. So far it has not bothered our dogs skin. I will continue to use this shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: the reader K.

customer_reviews.title: Clean dog and happy house!
customer_reviews.text: My dog used to stink 2 days after he was bathed. Now after using this shampoo he can go over a week without smelling up the whole house lol. Added bonus he is not shedding as much! Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: happybunny1

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo for Dogs with Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shampoo for my dog and does not dry her skin out or make her itchy; she has sensitive skin and allergies. The fragrance is a little overwhelming and sticks around for several days. This product would get 5 stars if they would tone down the smell.
customer_reviews.author: JokersD

customer_reviews.title: No more frito feet!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously smells so good I'd like to have a human version lol. My pug is a stinky little dude and this keeps him smelling fresh for a week or more, depending on what he gets into. Also makes his coarse fur very soft. Keeps his frito feets from coming back for WEEKS. Super reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica J.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Not only did this make my dogs skin flaky and hair start to fall out (more than usual). It made anyone that came in contact with our dog sneeze, cough, and skin itch like crazy. There’s nothing natural about that reaction. I would NOT recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Dominick Wernicke

customer_reviews.title: Good product, would repurchase
customer_reviews.text: We love this shampoo for my fur babies. It leaves their coats feeling soft and shiny. Although the smell could be stronger it seems to work overall very well on getting the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great for my yorkies!
customer_reviews.text: The best smelling/lasting shampoo I have found for my yorkie. I wash her once a week and shave her down a bit, but she would still get the yorkie BO. This really curbs it the longest and is gentle on her skin. :)
customer_reviews.author: T M.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely cleans the dog
customer_reviews.text: I'd recommend using with some sort of wash glove or something, as ours didn't lather up very well until we did. But since then, it's worked perfectly! Smells awesome and the dog is suuuuper soft after his baths.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rousseau

customer_reviews.title: Shampoo's lid came open and spilled everywhere
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo smells really good but haven't tried it on my dog yet. A good amount of it spilled inside the bag and also got the box it was shipped in all wet. The lid was popped open in transit. Obviously we are not getting the actual amount of shampoo that we paid for since it was spilled all over. We need dog shampoo so we will keep it but not sure I would order it again. They should have lids that don't open easily.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good go to shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This is our go to shampoo. Our corgi doesn’t have very much sensitive skin but we prefer the oatmeal shampoos anyway. The shampoo is easy to rinse off, it removes al the dirt and smell. The products doesn’t have a strong smell to, but for a while it stays on the fur.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha and Chris

product_meta.title: Nature's Miracle Supreme Odor Control
product_meta.description: Size:32 ozNature’s Miracle pet stain and odor removers have been a trusted brand for pet mess cleanup for more than 35 years. Whatever pets do, you can trust Nature’s Miracle stain and odor removers, training aids, disinfectants and litter products to undo. Nature’s Miracle Skin & Coat Supreme Odor Control Shampoo & Conditioner neutralizes a wide variety of odors on contact by forming an odor control complex. Acting as a deodorizer, this product provides long-term odor control. Formulated without dyes or parabens, the oatmeal formula soothes and hydrates the skin. This cocoa surfactant shampoo helps eliminate static electricity, while enhancing hair softness and helping to keep it cleaner longer. Nature’s Miracle Skin & Coat Supreme Odor Control Shampoo & Conditioner will also leave your pooch smelling fresh with its honey sage scent.
feature_bullets: Quality and performance driven products for your pet
Provide a better quality of living for your pet with United Pet Group
SOAP FREE: The soap-free formula is safe to use with spot-on flea and tick products, if the spot-on product is used as directed by the manufacturer of the spot-on product.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
